entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
